vulnerability_findings.name: array-length-outside-loop
vulnerability_findings.message: Caching the array length outside a loop saves reading it on each iteration, as long as the array's length is not changed during the loop.

vulnerability_findings.name: unnecessary-checked-arithmetic-in-loop

vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "only admin may initialize the market");
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(accrualBlockNumber == 0 && borrowIndex == 0, "market may only be initialized once");
vulnerability_findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-nested-if
vulnerability_findings.message: Using nested is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-prefix-decrement-not-postfix

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "only admin may initialize the market");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: compound-borrowfresh-reentrancy
vulnerability_findings.message: Function borrowFresh() in Compound performs state update after doTransferOut()

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
Unitroller.fallback (ComptrollerG1.sol#2969-2984) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	(success) = comptrollerImplementation.delegatecall(msg.data) (ComptrollerG1.sol#2971-2973)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
UnitrollerAdminStorage.comptrollerImplementation (ComptrollerG1.sol#2681-2683) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- adminOrInitializing (ComptrollerG1.sol#3966-3976)

vulnerability_findings.name: erc20-interface
vulnerability_findings.message:
EIP20NonStandardInterface (ComptrollerG1.sol#1152-1214) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (ComptrollerG1.sol#1178)
	-transferFrom (ComptrollerG1.sol#1192)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._addReservesInternal (ComptrollerG1.sol#2435-2447):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerG1.sol#2436-2437)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (ComptrollerG1.sol#2443-2444)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._reduceReserves (ComptrollerG1.sol#2498-2508):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerG1.sol#2499-2500)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReserves (ComptrollerG1.sol#2505-2506)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setComptroller (ComptrollerG1.sol#2367-2386):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newComptroller.isComptroller(),marker method returned false) (ComptrollerG1.sol#2375-2376)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- comptroller (ComptrollerG1.sol#2378-2379)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setInterestRateModel (ComptrollerG1.sol#2563-2573):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerG1.sol#2564-2565)
	- _setInterestRateModelFresh(newInterestRateModel) (ComptrollerG1.sol#2570-2571)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (ComptrollerG1.sol#2570-2571)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setInterestRateModelFresh (ComptrollerG1.sol#2579-2609):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(newInterestRateModel.isInterestRateModel(),marker method returned false) (ComptrollerG1.sol#2598-2600)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- interestRateModel (ComptrollerG1.sol#2601-2603)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken._setReserveFactor (ComptrollerG1.sol#2391-2401):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerG1.sol#2392-2393)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- reserveFactorMantissa (ComptrollerG1.sol#2398-2399)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ComptrollerG1._supportMarket (ComptrollerG1.sol#3916-3933):
	External calls:
	- cToken.isCToken() (ComptrollerG1.sol#3925)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- markets (ComptrollerG1.sol#3927-3928)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.accrueInterest (ComptrollerG1.sol#1599-1677):
	External calls:
	- borrowRateMantissa = interestRateModel.getBorrowRate(cashPrior,borrowsPrior,reservesPrior) (ComptrollerG1.sol#1616)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (ComptrollerG1.sol#1668)
	- borrowIndex (ComptrollerG1.sol#1669)
	- totalBorrows (ComptrollerG1.sol#1670)
	- totalReserves (ComptrollerG1.sol#1671)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.borrowInternal (ComptrollerG1.sol#1929-1937):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerG1.sol#1930)
	- borrowFresh(msg.sender,borrowAmount) (ComptrollerG1.sol#1936)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (ComptrollerG1.sol#1936)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ComptrollerG1.exitMarket (ComptrollerG1.sol#3162-3214):
	External calls:
	- (oErr,tokensHeld,amountOwed) = cToken.getAccountSnapshot(msg.sender) (ComptrollerG1.sol#3165-3166)
	- allowed = redeemAllowedInternal(cTokenAddress,msg.sender,tokensHeld) (ComptrollerG1.sol#3174-3175)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accountAssets (ComptrollerG1.sol#3206-3207)
	- accountAssets (ComptrollerG1.sol#3207-3209)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.initialize (ComptrollerG1.sol#1241-1272):
	External calls:
	- err = _setComptroller(comptroller_) (ComptrollerG1.sol#1255)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- accrualBlockNumber (ComptrollerG1.sol#1259)
	- borrowIndex (ComptrollerG1.sol#1260)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.liquidateBorrowInternal (ComptrollerG1.sol#2141-2156):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerG1.sol#2142)
	- error = cTokenCollateral.accrueInterest() (ComptrollerG1.sol#2148)
	- liquidateBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount,cTokenCollateral) (ComptrollerG1.sol#2155)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (ComptrollerG1.sol#2155)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.redeemFresh (ComptrollerG1.sol#1828-1922):
	External calls:
	- allowed = comptroller.redeemAllowed(address(this),redeemer,vars.redeemTokens) (ComptrollerG1.sol#1868)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSupply (ComptrollerG1.sol#1911)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.repayBorrowBehalfInternal (ComptrollerG1.sol#2037-2045):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerG1.sol#2038)
	- repayBorrowFresh(msg.sender,borrower,repayAmount) (ComptrollerG1.sol#2044)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (ComptrollerG1.sol#2044)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CToken.repayBorrowInternal (ComptrollerG1.sol#2021-2029):
	External calls:
	- error = accrueInterest() (ComptrollerG1.sol#2022)
	- repayBorrowFresh(msg.sender,msg.sender,repayAmount) (ComptrollerG1.sol#2028)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalBorrows (ComptrollerG1.sol#2028)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-local
vulnerability_findings.message: vars in CToken.redeemFresh (ComptrollerG1.sol#1831) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.message: actualAddAmount in CToken._addReservesFresh (ComptrollerG1.sol#2456-2458) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.message: vars in CToken.mintFresh (ComptrollerG1.sol#1724) is a local variable never initialiazed

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
ComptrollerG1._supportMarket (ComptrollerG1.sol#3916-3933) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-cToken.isCToken() (ComptrollerG1.sol#3925)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: (MathError err, Exp memory fraction) = divScalarByExp(scalar, divisor);
vulnerability_findings.message:
Exponential.divScalarByExpTruncate.fraction (local variable @ ComptrollerG1.sol#859) shadows:
	- Exponential.fraction (function @ ComptrollerG1.sol#1073-1075)

vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
ComptrollerG1.getHypotheticalAccountLiquidityInternal has external calls inside a loop:
	- (oErr,vars.cTokenBalance,vars.borrowBalance,vars.exchangeRateMantissa) = asset.getAccountSnapshot(account) (ComptrollerG1.sol#3645-3646)

vulnerability_findings.name: calls-loop
vulnerability_findings.message:
ComptrollerG1.getHypotheticalAccountLiquidityInternal has external calls inside a loop:
	- vars.oraclePriceMantissa = oracle.getUnderlyingPrice(asset) (ComptrollerG1.sol#3653-3654)
